Description: Primary key identifier for the stoplight color definition in a survey

Data Quality Checks: NOT NULL, Positive integer, FK validation to data_collect.survey_stoplight
NOT NULL, Positive integer, FK validation to library.stoplight_indicator

Description: Description of what this color means for this indicator in this survey
Sample Values: Red: Family has no source of income or unstable very low income

Data Quality Checks: Valid Unix timestamp, Not in future
Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.organizations
Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.applications

Description: Short title for this color definition
URL to an image illustrating this indicator state
Indicates if this is the default color definition for this indicator
User who last modified the record
Timestamp when the record was created

Data Quality Checks: Valid timestamp, Not in future, >= created_date
